topics.body:
*HORY SHIT!*
It's no secret that I like touhou, but I've been wondering why I haven't been able to complete a game in a while and I've only gotten 4 out of 6 stages(minus the extra stage) and I just found out.  I've been playing with frameskipping.  That means I haven't been playing at 60fps, but a 180fps on lunatic mode(W T FUCK?! mode essentially).

Imagine playing this at a 180fps:
!http://xtendedthoughts.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/danmaku1.jpg!

I suddenly feel a lot better about my video gaming skills.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"Erie County Hall":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/County_and_City_Hall, sure looks like a welcoming place.
